description: Its a very elegant residence with high ceilings, glass walls emerging outdoor space into indoor living so popular in California, plenty of spacious extra rooms as office,den, guest and maids quarter,movie theater,two enormous master bedrooms, two bars, entertainment room etc. Huge patio and true gallery windows with amazing views throughout. Secluded back yard with a large sparkling pool, spa, build-in full kitchen is great for the big parties. Being built just two years ago this gem in BHPO provides all brand new high fixtures everywhere you might just think of.Elevator, Smart house, surrounding sound system, top of the line appliances. Adorable and mainly affordable Beverly Hills house of dream.                                https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=ezgxN2c5uxN&mls=1
